attributes.action: start a petition to permanantley reduce standing charges for gas, electric
attributes.additional_details: Introduce gas, electricty prices pre-covid levels. Ban the explotation of the public by the gas, electric cartels. Legislate for the people as per the legal duty of Parliament instead of the corporations. Fufil the Pariamentary code by putting the population before profit margins.
attributes.background: To permantley reduce standing charges on gas and electric UK wide. Introduce a policy which curtails organisations benefitting off the poverty of the population. Reduce CEO payments and a universal basic gas, electric cost - UK wide. Cap Gas and electric costs - only review every 10 years.
